description: A butter chicken with a twist that is sure to please. You can adjust the chilli for the little ones.
name: Indian Butter Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs kashmiri (or other mild chilli powder)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 200 or 210 fan forced. Heat an oven tray until needed.
Mix together all your marinade ingredients in a bowl. Cut your thigh fillets to whichever size you like. Marinate them in the marinade mix for at least 20 minutes, longer is fine but not essential.
Place your marinated chicken in a single layer & cook in the oven for about 30 minutes. I turn chicken over halfway through. Remove from oven & start your sauce.

Sauce: In a saucepan add your tinned or chopped tomatoes with 1/2 cup water, garlic, ginger, cloves, cardamom, garam masala, fenugreek leaves, Kashmiri chilli powder, bay leaves, brown sugar, salt & cream. Bring to the boil & simmer for about 10 minutes.
Take out the bay leaves. With your stick blender or blender, pur√©e to a fine consistency.
Add your chicken pieces that were cooked in the marinade, leaving the marinade juices behind as it might be too salty.
Bring it to a gentle simmer & add your butter. Cook a further few minutes until your sauce is nice & glossy.
